sentence.Network_en: Mrs Allen's style of cooking owes much to her mother-in-law.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾伦太太的烹饪风格很大程度上承传于她的婆婆。

sentence.Network_en: Eleanor would later blame her mother-in-law for her husband'sfrequent absences.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃莉诺过后会因丈夫经常不在家而责怪婆婆。

sentence.Network_en: My mother and my mother - in - law are getting on famously.
sentence.Network_cn: 我母亲和我 婆婆 相处得很好.
